No Name Game

Status: Active
Project members: Thaelleth + 1
Genre: Strategy
Tags: Strategy, Stealth, Scifi, PC

General information

Our newest game project. Atleast on my side heavily inspired by Desperados: Wanted Dead or Alive and some other stealth/strategy games that I've played. The aim here is to create an interesting stealth game that incorporates the same kind of mechanics that Desperados has (e.g. silent kills, using environment to your advantage). Depending on how the game feels we might add or remove some features later on. Neither of us are exactly good in any kind of story writing or worldbuilding so the game itself might end up being fairly short unless we get help designing more mission/maps from somewhere else.

Tools

Most of the textures for the game will be from CC0 Textures or some other free resource and all of the modeling will be done with Blender. Parts of the UI will probably be created with GIMP or rendered with Blender from 3D geometry. The project is hosted (private) in Github and script editing will be done in Visual Studio Code.
